column4: How do I switch what screen I am on with the screen command? I am currently inside a Java program which is command line and I using ssh to access the server. I want to go to the main terminal without opening another ssh session.
Once it worked with the down arrow key but it just says "Wuf ----- Wuf"
yes, i used to do it
don't forget to mention that you're on a mac, with different keybindings
it shouldn't matter as long as I am not using the function keys
fair enough, but don't you think you should better ask in a mac support channel?
They would redirect me here anyway, It's an Ubuntu machine I am accessing with SSH and it's a command bulit into Ubuntu
in the future, please inform us that you wish to work with the CLI
What if they say "mint" as in "mint gum"
Nothing much, just sitting here at my computer on xChat like normal.
##windows wont help him, I think he should try #wine
please remove the underscore in your nic - no CDE is for unix
First you guys wanted me to remove the `, now the _? I can't go any lower using a nick I own. But I'll switch anyway
